comment: Its true, the days are getting longer and spring will be here before we know it! I truly dont mind waiting my turn for the vaccine, just get a little batty with the Groundhog Day nature of the days sometimes
amr:
# ::snt Its true, the days are getting longer and spring will be here before we know it! I truly dont mind waiting my turn for the vaccine, just get a little batty with the Groundhog Day nature of the days sometimes
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / true-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (g / get-03
                        :ARG1 (d / day)
                        :ARG2 (l / long-03
                              :ARG1 d
                              :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 d
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / more))))
                  :op2 (b / be-located-at-91
                        :ARG1 (s / spring)
                        :ARG2 (h2 / here)
                        :time (b2 / before
                              :op1 (k / know-01
                                    :ARG0 (w / we)
                                    :ARG1 g)))))
      :snt2 (m3 / mind-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (w2 / wait-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (t2 / turn-in-18
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (v / vaccine)))
            :ARG1-of t)
      :snt3 (g2 / get-03
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (b3 / batty
                  :degree (l2 / little)
                  :accompanier (n / nature
                        :mod (d2 / day)
                        :mod (e / event
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Groundhog"
                                    :op2 "Day"))))
            :time (s2 / sometimes)
            :mod (j / just)))

comment: Yes, but: the days are getting longer; we're only months away from spring; and we might get to do normal-ish stuff by summer. Hang in there, Christie!
amr:
